snippet.title: 【hololive fangame】BURNING TENSHI
snippet.description:
Link to the game: https://zsylver.itch.io/burning-tenshi
​


You can skip the levels in the pause menu if the levels are too hard

BURNING TENSHI is a fanmade hololive puzzle game created under a week by sylver for KanataContest 20/3/21. The game is free-to-play but any donations are very highly appreciated to keep me going creating more content!

It looks like a fight broke out in the Hololive House and Kanata ended up getting on fire! She is desperate to put it out and it is up to you to guide her way through the puzzles to reach the pond to extinguish the flames. There seems to be an interesting ending to this game as well, do stick around!

If you enjoyed my game, SMACK that subscribe button. It means a lot to me!
Consider following my socials as well!

Subscribe to Amane Kanata Ch: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZlDXzGoo7d44bwdNObFacg

Credits:
Game is inspired by Pokemon's sliding puzzles
​

୨୧┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈୨୧
discord: https://discord.gg/baQJ7KTrXj
twitter: https://www.twitter.com/zyo_sylver
soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/zyo-sylver
itch.io: https://zsylver.itch.io/

#フリー素材かなたそ#かなたーと#KanataContest #VtuberEn​​​​ #ホロライブ​ #hololive​​​​ #Vtuber​​​​ ​​​ #HoloEN​​​​ #VtuberEN​​​ #fangame​​​ #gamedev​
